Service

In the past I was a volunteer Taekwondo instructor at my academy, helping the full-time Instructors pass on what I had learned in an activity I loved to newer groups of martial artists.

I am a regular volunteer in Texas A&M Universityâ€™s annual Big Event community service project.

Currently I am working on open-source projects, such as maintaining Linux distributions on different platforms, in order to give back to a community that has so strongly nurtured my love of computers.
